text: 9|79|avarkal nampikkaiyalarkalil ulla celvantarkal (tankal porulkalai) nalvaliyil (taralamaka) tanam ceyvatu parriyum (kurippaka,) kulivelai ceytu campatippor (tankal porulai ivvaru tanam ceyvatu) parriyum kurram kuri avarkalaip parikacikkinranar. (Nampikkaiyalarkalaip parikacikkum) avarkalai allah parikacikkiran. Melum, (marumaiyil) tunpuruttum vetanaiyum avarkalukku untu
